__e: It's not right, is it, just the three of us?
It's Home Alone, except there's three of us.
Well, boys, looks like it's just the three of us.
To them, the absent Herr von Beulwitz is like an invisible enemy who will show up soon.
All right, we will do what you guys ask of us, but there's three of us and five of you guys
